entry.title: We are live! Come Join in and learn about @StatesDao and what they are up to
entry.summary: We are live! Come Join in and learn about @StatesDao and what they are up to States DAO (⌨️,⌨️): 🚨 AMA W/ DEVELOPER DAO 🚨 Join us TOMORROW for a ✨special✨ama with @developer_dao where we’ll be chatting about our accelerator States Launch, @spacebar_nft, and our roadmap WEN: ⏰ TOMORROW @ 6pm PST https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1dRKZMpXEvmxB

entry.summary: RT D_D Women We are excited to partner with @PhoenixGuildHQ, to onboard more female and non-binary developers into the world of solidity.✨ We will be sponsoring two @developer_dao memberships to participants who complete the bootcamp. entry.summary: RT Yaz Khoury Hey CT, @CelestiaOrg is hiring for a Devrel Program Manager to join the Devrel team! Come work with us to make hackathons, manage the Modular fellows program, build our event and sponsorship strategy and own swag 😎 You’ll also be mentored by me to help you grow your Devrel chops

entry.title: Thank you to everyone who joined us last Friday, for our 3rd Town Hall of Season 1. It was massively informative! We hope to open up more forums, wher...
entry.summary: Thank you to everyone who joined us last Friday, for our 3rd Town Hall of Season 1. It was massively informative! We hope to open up more forums, where we can discuss and share ideas as a community. Mint has now closed. Design: @boyluan

entry.summary: RT Narb | narbeh.eth Remember to get those spooky memes submitted for a chance to win 400 $CODE token that will give you full membership into @developer_dao 👇 DevNTell: 👻 Whose ready for #Spooktober giveaway? 🪄 As Halloween is upon us, reply to this tweet with your best original spooky #web3 meme for a chance to win 400 $CODE token 🧛 Submission deadline is Sunday Oct 30th at 7pm UTC 🎃 One winner will be chosen on Halloween Day (Oct 31st)
